THE DIVERSITY OF OKLAHOMA

Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Radio Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
In reference to your request from the Air Weather Service, I
would like to see such a series done for possible distribution
on the network. I think the general public could benefit from
a program explaining the mission of this organization.
The information contained in such a series could well be interest¬
ing and educational.
Count one "yes" vote.
Sincerely yours.
Hugh1#!. Mix, Acting Director
Educational Broadcasting Services
HMMsln
